Identity.Name: Archer Of Celintra
Identity.Basic_Description: Unarmored Archer clad in blue with golden ethereal bows

Abilities.Name: Lob
Abilities.Ability: This unit can extend line of site vertically for the purposes of attacking.

Abilities.Name: Volley
Abilities.Ability: This unit gains +2 skill for each other Archerss Of Celintra within 1 range.

Abilities.Name: Phase
Abilities.Ability: When using 'Sprint', Archers of Celintra can move through objects as long as they end their movement in a valid location.
